#10 Best Colleges for Computer Science in AmericaCornell UniversityIthaca, NY4 YearRating3.81out of 52,136 reviewsAlum:The Cornell education transcended academics. The true magic lay in experiences impossible to replicate elsewhere.

Five courses I like the most:
[1]. Robert H. Frank's "The Economic Naturalist", decode hidden economic forces in daily decisions – from coffee shop to supermarket.
[2]. Warren B. Bailey's Finance, used 10 mins derived the Time Value of Money and set my fundamental understanding of valuation.
[3]. Ming Huang's Annual China Economy Lecture, taught me how to operate a country.
[4]. Integrity, an alumnus in jail share with us his real experience. 
[5]. My very last lesson in Cornell: alumni graduated 10, 20, and 30 years gathered to share their real live journey.

Expect the extraordinary in the campus: your PE instructor might be an Olympic champion, or a billionare who recently sold his company to Google.

To all Cornellians: enjoy your days far above the cayuga water, ready to become your best self.
